library.name: A Comprehensive Bibliography on Syriac Studies

bib: Maclean, Arthur John. East Syrian Daily Offices, Translated from the Syriac, with Introduction, Notes, and Indices, and an Appendix Containing the Lectionary and Glossary. Publications of the Eastern Church Association 1. London: Rivington, Percival & Co., 1894.
citation: Arthur John Maclean, East Syrian Daily Offices, Translated from the Syriac, with Introduction, Notes, and Indices, and an Appendix Containing the Lectionary and Glossary, Publications of the Eastern Church Association 1 (London: Rivington, Percival & Co., 1894).

data.title: East Syrian Daily Offices, Translated from the Syriac, with Introduction, Notes, and Indices, and an Appendix Containing the Lectionary and Glossary
data.abstractNote:
Table of Contents

    * Preface
    * Introduction
    * Ferial Evening Service, Week 'Before,' with the Martyrs' Anthems
    * Ferial Evening Service, Week 'After'
    * Ferial Evening Service
    * Ferial Night Service
    * Ferial Morning Service
    * Motwa for Wednesdays at the Night Service
    * Festival Night Service
    * Festival Morning Service
    * Compline
    * The Services in the Fast
    * An Occasional Karuzutha
    * Rogation of the Ninevites
    * Blessing of the Months
    * Farcings of the Psalms
    * Prayers on various occasions
    * Indices to the Psalms
data.series: Publications of the Eastern Church Association 1
